name: flamigo

abilities.name: scrappy
abilities.description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type foes.

abilities.name: tangled-feet
abilities.description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

abilities.name: costar
abilities.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.

description: This Pokémon apparently ties the base of its neck into a knot so that energy stored in its belly does not escape from its beak.
